fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Select a player to vandalize their house. All players who visit them will receive completely random feedback.
- Follow a player to vandalize who they visit, giving your target completely random feedback.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If your target doesn't get feedback normally, you'll still create false feedback for them.
- Your false feedback can only be things that could theoretically occur in some capacity.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Take down the town through various crimes.
